de.dirkgasser.brauen

Class TemperaturWatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dirkgasser.brauen.TemperaturWatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TemperaturWatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    TemperaturWatcher calls every 4 seconds the TemperaturSensor
    and write the temperature in the global variable currentTemp
    If the test screen is active, the temperatur is shown there
    Also the delta temperatur is calculated to stop heater in time
